description: This file defines a Dart class 'NotificationItem' used as a data model with JSON serialization support.

classes.name: NotificationItem
classes.description: A data model class representing a notification with fields for id, userId, message, and read status, equipped with JSON serialization methods.

methods.name: NotificationItem.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a NotificationItem instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Serializes the NotificationItem instance to a JSON map.
